how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.me: Hi i'm peter and i love technology so i was curious about running a staking pool. Every epoch i sit here and generate leader logs to predict when this pool is elected to mint a block to observe the pool operation in this timeframe with belt and braces.
about.server: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 hexacore with 12 threads, 2 TB SSDs und 64 GB DDR4 RAM
